zh-CN.homeHelperTitle: MDN Web 文档本地化助手
zh-CN.homeIntro: 这是一个用于翻译 MDN Web 文档的辅助工具，通过对比译文与当前英文源文档的差异来提升审核效率。
zh-CN.homeToken1: 在使用本工具前，你需要生成一个 GitHub 访问令牌，并为其授予要访问的仓库的读取权限。你需要在
zh-CN.homeToken2: 进行设置。没有访问令牌，使用 GitHub REST API 可能会受到限制。
zh-CN.homeCompare2: 页面，逐行比较某篇文档与
zh-CN.homePR2: 页面，快速获取某个 PR 下所有文件在比较页面中的链接。
zh-CN.homeCopyright: 版权所有 © Hoarfroster 与各贡献者（2025）。保留所有权利。
zh-CN.enableMarkdownListProcessing: 启用 Markdown 列表处理
zh-CN.enableMarkdownBQProcessing: 启用 Markdown 引用块处理
zh-CN.msgPathLocaleRequired: 路径与语言区域为必填项
zh-CN.msgNoEntriesFoundInLocalStorage: 在 localStorage 中未找到该路径对应的条目
zh-CN.msgEntriesReadFromLocalStorage: 已从 localStorage 读取条目
zh-CN.diffEntriesUnavailable: 没有可用于比较的条目。
zh-CN.msgPRIdRequired: 需要提供 PR 编号
zh-CN.msgGitHubRateLimit: GitHub API 请求次数已达上限，请稍后再试
zh-CN.msgGitHubForbidden: GitHub API 访问被拒绝，请检查访问令牌权限
zh-CN.noPRsFound: 未找到 PR。请尝试调整筛选条件。
zh-CN.selectFileToViewDiff: 从列表中选择文件以查看差异。
zh-CN.prefWarning1: 这些偏好设置将以未加密的形式保存在你的浏览器本地存储中。请务必只在你信任的设备上使用本应用，否则可能导致这些偏好设置甚至账号数据泄露。
zh-CN.prefWarning2: 某些偏好设置可能需要刷新页面后才能生效。
zh-CN.prefWarning3: 清除浏览器��存或站点存储的数据将会丢失这些偏好设置。
zh-CN.followSystemThemeDesc: 根据系统偏好自动在浅色与深色主题之间切换
zh-CN.accessTokenDesc: 用于访问 GitHub API 的访问令牌。

en-US.homeHelperTitle: Helper of MDN Web Docs Localization
en-US.homeIntro: This is a helper tool for translating MDN Web Docs to boost the process of reviewing by checking the difference between the translation and the current source.
en-US.homeToken1: Before using the tool, a GitHub access token may be generated and the token itself must have the repository you want to access read permission. You need to set it
en-US.homeToken2: . Without Access Token, your access to the GitHub Rest API may not be guaranteed.
en-US.homeCompare2: page to compare and see the difference line by line between some documentation and
en-US.homePR2: page to quickly obtain the URLs of all files under a certain PR of the compare page.
en-US.homeCopyright: Copyright © Hoarfroster and other collaborators 2025, all rights reserved.
en-US.msgNoEntriesFoundInLocalStorage: No entries with the given path found in localStorage
en-US.diffEntriesUnavailable: Entries are not available for comparison.
en-US.msgGitHubRateLimit: GitHub API rate limit exceeded. Please try again later
en-US.msgGitHubForbidden: GitHub API access forbidden. Please check your access token permissions
en-US.noPRsFound: No PRs found. Try adjusting filters.
en-US.selectFileToViewDiff: Select a file from the list to view diff.
en-US.prefWarning1: These preferences will only be saved to your browser's local storage without encryption. Be always sure to use the application only on device you trusted, otherwise leak of these preferences or even account data may occur.
en-US.prefWarning2: Certain preferences may require a page refresh to take effect.
en-US.prefWarning3: By clearing browser cache or delete site's stored data, you will lose these preferences forever.
en-US.followSystemThemeDesc: Automatically switch between light and dark themes based on your system preference
en-US.accessTokenDesc: Access Token generated from GitHub for API access.
en-US.languageDesc: Language to use for the application.
